Hey all! Wanted to share a little demo I made of a weapon and combat system, really basic but give beginners a starting point before diving into library's and coding. This is all done in GUI editor and the video link describes what you can do with the system, how to use it and make new weapons for your game. Hope it helps some of you cheers.

Mike 

Video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yiQRfCjl1Lg&feature=youtu.be
Weapon Demo https://www.dropbox.com/s/55ph12g04a4lq17/WeaponTest.zip?dl=0
